card.name: Abandon Hope
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Abandon Hope, discard X cards. Look at target opponent's hand and choose X cards from it. That player discards those cards.

card.name: Advance Scout
card.text: First strike {W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Aftershock
card.text: Destroy target artifact, creature, or land. Aftershock deals 3 damage to you.

card.name: Altar of Dementia
card.text: Sacrifice a creature: Target player puts a number of cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Aluren
card.text: Any player may play creature cards with converted mana cost 3 or less without paying their mana cost and as though they had flash.

card.name: Ancient Runes
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, Ancient Runes deals damage to that player equal to the number of artifacts he or she controls.

card.name: Ancient Tomb
card.text: {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool. Ancient Tomb deals 2 damage to you.

card.name: Angelic Protector
card.text: Flying Whenever Angelic Protector becomes the target of a spell or ability, Angelic Protector gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Anoint
card.text: Buyback {3} Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

card.name: Apes of Rath
card.text: Whenever Apes of Rath attacks, it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Apocalypse
card.text: Exile all permanents. You discard your hand.

card.name: Armor Sliver
card.text: All Sliver creatures have "{2}: This creature gets +0/+1 until end of turn."

card.name: Auratog
card.text: Sacrifice an enchantment: Auratog gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Avenging Angel
card.text: Flying When Avenging Angel dies, you may put it on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Barbed Sliver
card.text: All Sliver creatures have "{2}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

card.name: Bayou Dragonfly
card.text: Flying, swampwalk

card.name: Bellowing Fiend
card.text: Flying Whenever Bellowing Fiend deals damage to a creature, Bellowing Fiend deals 3 damage to that creature's controller and 3 damage to you.

card.name: Blood Frenzy
card.text: Cast Blood Frenzy only before the combat damage step. Target attacking or blocking creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn. Destroy that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Blood Pet
card.text: Sacrifice Blood Pet: Add {B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Boil
card.text: Destroy all Islands.

card.name: Booby Trap
card.text: As Booby Trap enters the battlefield, name a card other than a basic land card and choose an opponent. The chosen player reveals each card he or she draws. When the chosen player draws the named card, sacrifice Booby Trap. If you do, Booby Trap deals 10 damage to that player.

card.name: Bottle Gnomes
card.text: Sacrifice Bottle Gnomes: You gain 3 life.

card.name: Bounty Hunter
card.text: {T}: Put a bounty counter on target nonblack creature. {T}: Destroy target creature with a bounty counter on it.

card.name: Broken Fall
card.text: Return Broken Fall to its owner's hand: Regenerate target creature.

card.name: Caldera Lake
card.text: Caldera Lake enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool. Caldera Lake deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Canyon Drake
card.text: Flying {1}, Discard a card at random: Canyon Drake gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Capsize
card.text: Buyback {3} Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Carrionette
card.text: {2}{B}{B}: Exile Carrionette and target creature unless that creature's controller pays {2}. Activate this ability only if Carrionette is in your graveyard.

card.name: Chaotic Goo
card.text: Chaotic Goo enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may flip a coin. If you win the flip, put a +1/+1 counter on Chaotic Goo. If you lose the flip, remove a +1/+1 counter from Chaotic Goo.

card.name: Charging Rhino
card.text: Charging Rhino can't be blocked by more than one creature.

card.name: Chill
card.text: Red spells cost {2} more to cast.

card.name: Choke
card.text: Islands don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

card.name: Cinder Marsh
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool. Cinder Marsh doesn't untap during your next untap step.

card.name: Circle of Protection: Black
card.text: {1}: The next time a black source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Circle of Protection: Blue
card.text: {1}: The next time a blue source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Circle of Protection: Green
card.text: {1}: The next time a green source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Circle of Protection: Red
card.text: {1}: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Circle of Protection: Shadow
card.text: {1}: The next time a creature of your choice with shadow would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Circle of Protection: White
card.text: {1}: The next time a white source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Clergy en-Vec
card.text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

card.name: Clot Sliver
card.text: All Slivers have "{2}: Regenerate this permanent."

card.name: Cloudchaser Eagle
card.text: Flying When Cloudchaser Eagle enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Coercion
card.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Coffin Queen
card.text: You may choose not to untap Coffin Queen during your untap step. {2}{B}, {T}: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. When Coffin Queen becomes untapped or you lose control of Coffin Queen, exile that creature.

card.name: Coiled Tinviper
card.text: First strike

card.name: Cold Storage
card.text: {3}: Exile target creature you control. Sacrifice Cold Storage: Return each creature card exiled with Cold Storage to the battlefield under your control.

card.text: Fear When Commander Greven il-Vec enters the battlefield, sacrifice a creature.

card.name: Corpse Dance
card.text: Buyback {2} Return the top creature card of your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature gains haste until end of turn. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Counterspell
card.text: Counter target spell.

card.name: Crazed Armodon
card.text: {G}: Crazed Armodon gets +3/+0 and gains trample until end of turn. Destroy Crazed Armodon at the beginning of the next end step. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Crown of Flames
card.text: Enchant creature {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {R}: Return Crown of Flames to its owner's hand.

card.name: Cursed Scroll
card.text: {3}, {T}: Name a card. Reveal a card at random from your hand. If it's the named card, Cursed Scroll deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Dark Banishing
card.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.text: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Darkling Stalker
card.text: {B}: Regenerate Darkling Stalker. {B}: Darkling Stalker gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Dauthi Embrace
card.text: {B}{B}: Target creature gains shadow until end of turn.

card.name: Dauthi Ghoul

card.name: Dauthi Mercenary
card.text: Shadow {1}{B}: Dauthi Mercenary gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Dauthi Mindripper
card.text: Shadow Whenever Dauthi Mindripper attacks and isn't blocked, you may sacrifice it. If you do, defending player discards three cards.

card.name: Dauthi Slayer
card.text: Shadow Dauthi Slayer attacks each turn if able.

card.name: Deadshot
card.text: Tap target creature. It deals damage equal to its power to another target creature.

card.name: Death Pits of Rath
card.text: Whenever a creature is dealt damage, destroy it. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Diabolic Edict
card.text: Target player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Dirtcowl Wurm
card.text: Whenever an opponent plays a land, put a +1/+1 counter on Dirtcowl Wurm.

card.name: Disenchant
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Dismiss
card.text: Counter target spell. Draw a card.

card.name: Disturbed Burial
card.text: Buyback {3} Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Dracoplasm
card.text: Flying As Dracoplasm enters the battlefield, sacrifice any number of creatures. Dracoplasm's power becomes the total power of those creatures and its toughness becomes their total toughness. {R}: Dracoplasm gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Dread of Night
card.text: White creatures get -1/-1.

card.name: Dream Cache
card.text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand both on top of your library or both on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Dregs of Sorrow
card.text: Destroy X target nonblack creatures. Draw X cards.

card.name: Duplicity
card.text: When Duplicity enters the battlefield, exile the top five cards of your library face down. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile all cards from your hand face down. If you do, put all other cards you own exiled with Duplicity into your hand. At the beginning of your end step, discard a card. When you lose control of Duplicity, put all cards exiled with Duplicity into their owner's graveyard.

card.name: Earthcraft
card.text: Tap an untapped creature you control: Untap target basic land.

card.name: Echo Chamber
card.text: {4}, {T}: An opponent chooses target creature he or she controls. Put a token that's a copy of that creature onto the battlefield. That token gains haste until end of turn. Exile the token at the beginning of the next end step. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Eladamri, Lord of Leaves
card.text: Other Elf creatures have forestwalk. Other Elves have shroud.

card.name: Eladamri's Vineyard
card.text: At the beginning of each player's precombat main phase, add {G}{G} to that player's mana pool.

card.name: Elite Javelineer

card.name: Ertai's Meddling
card.text: X can't be 0. Target spell's controller exiles it with X delay counters on it. At the beginning of each of that player's upkeeps, if that card is exiled, remove a delay counter from it. If the card has no delay counters on it, he or she puts it onto the stack as a copy of the original spell.

card.name: Escaped Shapeshifter
card.text: As long as an opponent controls a creature with flying not named Escaped Shapeshifter, Escaped Shapeshifter has flying. The same is true for first strike, trample, and protection from any color.

card.name: Essence Bottle
card.text: {3}, {T}: Put an elixir counter on Essence Bottle. {T}, Remove all elixir counters from Essence Bottle: You gain 2 life for each elixir counter removed this way.

card.text: {2}{B}{B}: Put a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

card.text: Flying {R}: Firefly gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Fireslinger
card.text: {T}: Fireslinger deals 1 damage to target creature or player and 1 damage to you.

card.name: Flickering Ward

card.text: {2}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you have no cards in hand.

card.name: Fugitive Druid
card.text: Whenever Fugitive Druid becomes the target of an Aura spell, you draw a card.

card.name: Harrow

card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a green spell, you draw a card.

card.text: Counter target activated ability from an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land. That permanent's activated abilities can't be activated this turn. Draw a card.

card.text: Search your library for three cards and reveal them. Target opponent chooses one. Put that card into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Then shuffle your library.

card.text: Buyback {3} The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.text: Whenever Jackal Pup is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to you.

card.text: {B}, {T}: Leeching Licid loses this ability and becomes an Aura enchantment with enchant creature. Attach it to target creature. You may pay {B} to end this effect. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, Leeching Licid deals 1 damage to that player.

card.name: Legacy's Allure
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a treasure counter on Legacy's Allure. Sacrifice Legacy's Allure: Gain control of target creature with power less than or equal to the number of treasure counters on Legacy's Allure.

card.text: Lightning Blast deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

card.text: Each player exiles all creature cards from his or her graveyard, then sacrifices all creatures he or she controls, then puts all cards he or she exiled this way onto the battlefield.

card.name: Lobotomy
card.text: Target player reveals his or her hand, then you choose a card other than a basic land card from it. Search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as the chosen card and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

card.name: Lotus Petal

card.name: Maddening Imp
card.text: Flying {T}: Non-Wall creatures the active player controls attack this turn if able. At the beginning of the next end step, destroy each of those creatures that didn't attack this turn. Activate this ability only during an opponent's turn and only before combat.

card.name: Magmasaur
card.text: Magmasaur enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may remove a +1/+1 counter from Magmasaur. If you don't, sacrifice Magmasaur and it deals damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to each creature without flying and each player.

card.name: Magnetic Web
card.text: If a creature with a magnet counter on it attacks, all creatures with magnet counters on them attack if able. Whenever a creature with a magnet counter on it attacks, all creatures with magnet counters on them block that creature this turn if able. {1}, {T}: Put a magnet counter on target creature.
